title: WICKER PARK 2BR 2BA -
posting_body: Do you enjoy the culture and entertainment on Division Street?
If you lived at 1215 N Damen you wouldn't have to worry about parking/cabs or CTA in order to visit your favorite Division street restaurants and entertainment spots.
You couldn't park any closer than where you'd already be living.
Do you work long hours with no time to enjoy Chicago?
Living here you could walk out your front door and go for a quick drink and be back home in bed in 20 minutes for a full night's sleep.
Large bright 2 Bedroom/2 Full Baths in Wicker Park Historic District.
This 1890's Victorian has been completely rehabbed including extra insulation within original brick as well as double thermopane windows for energy efficiency and sound insulation.
Historic tin ceilings in front+dining rooms were re-fabricated and installed to match originals from 1890.
This unit has: 2 full bathrooms with tub/shower in one bathroom and double shower in 2nd bathroom. .
A whole wall of closets in the Master BR and  in 2nd BR(see pictures).
#50 Damen + #70 Division Bus Stops merely steps from your door.
Damen Blue Line 'L' Stop less than 4 blocks away.
So whether you walk, drive, bike, use public transit, or fly(Blue Line connects directly to O'hare) you have your choice!
